news.title: Parsvnath Developers' net loss widens to Rs 99.40 crore in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 44.76 crore in Q2 FY23, a dip of 3.60 per cent from Rs 46.43 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Ashiana Housing posts net loss of Rs 1.61 crore in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 91.72 crore in Q2 FY23, a growth of of 13.67 per cent from Rs 80.69 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Shriram Properties posts net profit of Rs 19.59 crore in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 275.83 crore in Q2 FY23, a growth of 192.72 per cent from Rs 94.23 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: China allows property developers to access some pre-sale funds
news.para: The notice follows an extensive package outlined by Chinese regulators to shore up financing in the struggling property sector. Chinese property stocks and bonds surged on Monday as the market cheered the measures.

news.title: Keystone Realtors IPO subscribed 8% on Day 1
news.para: The Rs 635-crore IPO received bids for 7,24,599 shares against 86,47,858 shares on offer, according to an update available with the NSE.

news.title: Indiabulls Housing Finance posts net profit of Rs 289.48 crore in Q2 FY23
news.para: The board has approved for issuance and allotment of secured and/or unsecured, listed and/or unlisted, redeemable non-convertible debentures, on private placement or public issue basis or otherwise, in one or more tranches, for an aggregate amount of up to Rs 5,000 crore.

news.title: Mindspace REIT's net profit dips by 32.72% in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 686.20 crore in Q2 FY23, a growth of of 60.18 per cent from Rs 428.40 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: TARC's net profit up 54% in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 58.21 crore in Q2 FY23, a dip of 63.85 per cent from Rs 161.02 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Ansal Buildwell posts profit of Rs 38 lakh in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 14.91 crore in Q2 FY23, a dip of 87.49 per cent from Rs 119.21 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Shalimar Paints posts net loss of Rs 10.75 crore in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 111.83 crore in Q2 FY23, a growth of of 22.90 per cent from Rs 90.99 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: NBCC's net profit up 32.36% in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 2,073.89 crore in Q2 FY23, a growth of 7.56 per cent from Rs 1,928.08 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Brigade Enterprises posts Rs 51.75 crore profit in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 912.19 crore in Q2 FY23, a growth of 17.54 per cent from Rs 776.08 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Pune: PMRDA keen to finish Hinjewadi-Shivajinagar metro line III fast
news.para: PMRDA has completed 20% of the work for this entirely elevated Metro line, said superintending engineer Rinaz Pathan. This November 25 marks one year since the agreement to commence this work was signed with the executing agency, to be finished in 40 months.

news.title: Omaxe's net loss widens to Rs 87.38 crore in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 122.28 crore in Q2 FY23, a dip of 36.09 per cent from Rs 191.34 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: SC to set up fresh bench to hear pleas of home buyers against Amrapali Group
news.para: The apex court, in its July 23, 2019 verdict, had cracked down on errant builders for breaching the trust reposed by home buyers and ordered the cancellation of registration of the Amrapali group under real estate law RERA and ousted it from prime properties in the national capital region (NCR) by nixing land leases.
